mapper.select: select a.*,b.co_nm as "coNm" from (select o.order_no as "orderNo" ,o.recv_dt as "recvDt" ,o.prog_info as "progInfo" ,o.paprd_dt as "paprdDt" ,o.co_cd ,d.prdt_cd as "prdtCd" ,d.order_qty as "orderQty" ,d.indica_qty as "indicaQty" ,d.oust_qty as "oustQty" ,d.prdt_stc as "prdtStc" from order_tb o join order_d d on o.order_no=d.order_no) a join co b on a.co_cd=b.co_cd
